spec_data.Name: check-create-certificate
spec_data.Description:
A script that checks for the existence of an SSL certificate
or creates a new self signed one. It runs non-interactively and
uses either predefined values or automatically guesses the best values.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:28:52 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A non-interactive script that creates an SSL certificate if it does not exist
